channel.title: The "you dont have JDK" Error, but i have JDK on ! Plz help (pic)
channel.description:
So i was trying to run a server.
It says that i had to compile it first
I tryed.. but i get this:
[img]http://xs322.xs.to/xs322/07480/javacproblem2.png[/img]
Someone know how to fix ?
And the site in pic doesnt work

item.title: The "you dont have JDK" Error, but i have JDK on ! Plz help (pic)
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Make sure you have downloaded Java. FIgure out what version you have by opening ‘My Computer’ then ‘C:’ then ‘Program Files’ and then ‘Java.’ See what version you have and follow this tutorial onsetting your paths. Also, use Taharok’s compiler found at the top of this section, in the ‘FAQ’s And Basic Information’ thread.

Read full topic

item.title: The "you dont have JDK" Error, but i have JDK on ! Plz help (pic)
item.dc:creator: @You_Are_Sick You Are Sick
item.description:
@You_Are_Sick wrote:

jj boss:

Well, whatever version of JDK u have… like where it says 6.0_03 if u have 5.0_3 then vchange teh 6 to the 5… and there ya done… oh yeh and before doin all that… right click then go to edit otherwise u cant do it hope i helped.

How? I dont see a edit option …

Read full topic

item.title: The "you dont have JDK" Error, but i have JDK on ! Plz help (pic)
item.dc:creator: @jj_boss jj boss
item.description:
@jj_boss wrote:

Well, whatever version of JDK u have… like where it says 6.0_03 if u have 5.0_3 then vchange teh 6 to the 5… and there ya done… oh yeh and before doin all that… right click then go to edit otherwise u cant do it hope i helped.

item.title: The "you dont have JDK" Error, but i have JDK on ! Plz help (pic)
item.dc:creator: @You_Are_Sick You Are Sick
item.description:
@You_Are_Sick wrote:

[quote=“Devianz, post:3, topic:162107”]Try using my compiler:

@echo off echo Devianz's Simple Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" server pause
Or Follow this part of God’s tutorial here[/quote]

How do i put that code in the compiler?
i cant even delete the text

And that tutorial i did tons of times i followed tut for upd 3 …

Read full topic

item.title: The "you dont have JDK" Error, but i have JDK on ! Plz help (pic)
item.dc:creator: @Devianz Devianz
item.description:
@Devianz wrote:

Try using my compiler:

@echo off echo Devianz's Simple Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" server pause
Or Follow this part of God’s tutorial here
